title: Book Cover, "Les Enquetes D'Adam Dalgliesh"
description: Upper edge of front cover, book series classification on one line in black text and in the middle of that the Le Livre de Poche logo in red and white. Below, in large black text author's name. Below author's name, three lines of text containing title. Below title, brown-toned watercolor portrait of woman. Below portrait, one line of black text. Back cover, three lines of book description in black text on white ground. Spine, book series classification in two lines of black text on white ground above one line containing author's name in black text. Below author's name, four lines containing title, above miniature brown-toned portrait of a woman. At lower part of spine, the Le Livre de Poche logo in red and white.

tombstone.epitaph: Book Cover, "Les Enquetes D'Adam Dalgliesh".offset lithography. Gift of Steven Heller. 1996-74-209.
